description.narrative: The objective of the project is to significantly increase the use of banking system transactions for effecting or receiving payments for labor, goods and services nationwide through the implementation of a national inter-operable payments system that facilitates access to financial services and allows users access to their bank account using any mobile phone operator and cashing through any banking agent.

condition.narrative: Furnish the Association not later than 6 months after end of each year the certified copies of the audited accounts
PIE maintain records and accounts adequate to to reflect sound accounting practices
Prepare and furnish the Association not later than 45 days each calander quarter interim unaudited financial reports for the project
Project Implementing Agency will take action to establsih an independent MIPS Business Unit
Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Agency to implement the Op. Manual
Recipient shall ensure that its representatives attend all the meetings of the Policy Steering Commitee and Advisory Committee
